name: Dynamic Mixing
description: Demonstration of dynamic mixing with automated instrument levels and panning

performance.notes: Dynamic mixing demonstration with automated instrument levels and panning. Bars 1-8: Piano spotlight (volume 0.7, pan left -0.3), strings soft (volume 0.3, center). Bars 9-16: Strings spotlight (volume 0.6, pan right 0.3), piano fades (volume 0.5, center). Bars 17-24: Brass spotlight (volume 0.7, pan left -0.2), strings fade. Bars 25-32: Woodwind spotlight (volume 0.7, pan right 0.2), brass fade. Bars 33-40: Choir spotlight (volume 0.6, center), woodwind fade. Bars 41-48: All balanced, piano returns to melody. Each instrument gets spotlight. Creates dynamic, evolving mix.
performance.technique: Automate volume for spotlight. Automate pan for movement. One instrument spotlighted at a time. Others fade to background. Cycle through instruments. Return to balance at end. Dynamic mix = evolution.
performance.structure: Bars 1-8: Piano spotlight. Bars 9-16: Strings spotlight. Bars 17-24: Brass spotlight. Bars 25-32: Woodwind spotlight. Bars 33-40: Choir spotlight. Bars 41-48: Balance.
performance.tip: Volume automation = spotlight. Pan automation = movement. One instrument at a time = focus. Cycle through instruments = variety. Return to balance = resolution.
